comment.author: 79297804@N08
comment._content:
I don't think I can find a place call Battery Point on the Hong Kong map anymore. 
Since this was looking onto the Queen's Road I assume it might be from Causeway Bay, Tin Hau, Fortress Hill or even North Point?

comment.author: 8265544@N05
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/pixysam]samuel_132

It's still there in the Central.   Now called the Battery Path.

comment.author: 61013804@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/hkclarence]  I agree with Clarence that it is Battery Path, leading up to the Court of Final Appeal. The tower in the centre is at Peddar St, built in 1862 and demolished in 1913. So the street (not visible) between the buildings at 4 o'clock should be Ice House St
